span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 意见不合：difference of opinion; disagreement
【例】 Although we have dissension, we are friend all the same.
【例】There is a continued dissension among historians on the exact spot of Columbus's first landing.
【近】 conflict, disaccord, discordance, discordancy, disharmony, dissent, dissidence, dissonance, disunion, disunity, division, friction, inharmony, schism, strife
【反】 accord, agreement, concord, concordance, harmony, consensus, unanimity 不和谐，不一致
【记】 dis + consent 同意
【另】 absent (ab + present) 缺席，assent consent (同感) 同意，dissent (不同感) 不同意，present 现在
，礼物，resent (反感)憎恨
